Package nl.naturalis.purl.rest

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PurlHandler
    Interface specifying the capabilities of PURL request handling classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPurlHandler
    Abstract base class for classes capable of handling PURL requests.
    ContentNegotiator
    A ContentNegotiator establishes the type of content to be served to the client by comparing Accept headers with the actually available content types for the requested object.
    ContentNegotiatorFactory
    A ContentNegotiatorFactory handles the configuration and creation of ContentNegotiators.
    MultimediaPurlHandler
    A PurlHandler capable of handling PURLs for multimedia objects.
    PurlApplication
    JAX-RS framework class.
    ResourceUtil
    Utility class providing useful REST-related functionality.
    SpecimenPurlHandler
    A PurlHandler capable of handling PURLs for specimen objects.
